00034 function barcode_gen_ean_sum($ean)
00035 {
00036   $even=true; $esum=0; $osum=0;
00037   for ($i=strlen($ean)-1;$i>=0;$i--){
00038  if ($even) $esum+=$ean[$i]; else $osum+=$ean[$i];
00039  $even=!$even;
00040   }
00041   return (10-((3*$esum+$osum)%10))%10;
00042 }
00043 
00053 function barcode_encode_ean($ean, $encoding = "EAN-13")
00054 {
00055     $digits=array(3211,2221,2122,1411,1132,1231,1114,1312,1213,3112);
00056     $mirror=array("000000","001011","001101","001110","010011","011001","011100","010101","010110","011010");
00057     $guards=array("9a1a","1a1a1","a1a");
00058 
00059     $ean=trim($ean);
00060     if (eregi("[^0-9]",$ean)){
00061  return array("text"=>"Invalid EAN-Code");
00062     }
00063     $encoding=strtoupper($encoding);
00064     if ($encoding=="ISBN"){
00065  if (!ereg("^978", $ean)) $ean="978".$ean;
00066     }
00067     if (ereg("^978", $ean)) $encoding="ISBN";
00068     if (strlen($ean)<12 || strlen($ean)>13){
00069  return array("text"=>"Invalid $encoding Code (must have 12/13 numbers)");
00070     }
00071 
00072     $ean=substr($ean,0,12);
00073     $eansum=barcode_gen_ean_sum($ean);
00074     $ean.=$eansum;
00075     $line=$guards[0];
00076     for ($i=1;$i<13;$i++){
00077  $str=$digits[$ean[$i]];
00078  if ($i<7 && $mirror[$ean[0]][$i-1]==1) $line.=strrev($str); else $line.=$str;
00079  if ($i==6) $line.=$guards[1];
00080     }
00081     $line.=$guards[2];
00082 
00083     /* create text */
00084     $pos=0;
00085     $text="";
00086     for ($a=0;$a<13;$a++){
00087  if ($a>0) $text.=" ";
00088  $text.="$pos:12:{$ean[$a]}";
00089  if ($a==0) $pos+=12;
00090  else if ($a==6) $pos+=12;
00091  else $pos+=7;
00092     }
00093 
00094     return array(
00095   "encoding" => $encoding,
00096   "bars" => $line,
00097   "text" => $text
00098   );
00099 }
00100 
00101 ?>
